column4: I have Xgl installed and im able to run it although it performs really really badly :( ... i have proprietary ati drivers installed on my radeon 9250 with 128ram an athlon xp processor and 512 system ram???
I setup xgl on a similar system (p4/2.4ghz/1gb/9200SE 128) and it ran horribly, then I stuck a TNT2 in it and it got way faster
I'd say the ati drivers aren't happy with xgl right now
